ThingDef.label: brain stimulator
ThingDef.description: A small device that does its best to stimulate the remaining areas of the brain. Recommended for severe brain damage only. Requires brain surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: surrogate lung
ThingDef.description: A rudimentary lung replacement. Makes a deep, clicking noise.

ThingDef.label: surrogate stomach
ThingDef.description: A rudimentary stomach replacement. Produces unpleasant smelling bowel gas.

ThingDef.label: surrogate liver
ThingDef.description: A rudimentary blood filter. Has problems with keeping the blood sugar level constant.

ThingDef.label: surrogate kidney
ThingDef.description: A rudimentary kidney replacement. One of its possible side effects is getting pale.

ThingDef.label: surrogate heart
ThingDef.description: A more or less powerful pump to maintain the bloodstream. Patients feel exhausted from time to time.
